item1: ITEM 1. BUSINESS. Skyworks Solutions, Inc., together its consolidated subsidiaries (“Skyworks” “Company”), leading developer, manufacturer provider analog mixed-signal semiconductor products solutions numerous applications, including aerospace, automotive, broadband, cellular infrastructure, connected home, defense, entertainment gaming, industrial, medical, smartphone, tablet, wearables. Over past two decades, Skyworks made important investments address key network technologies, cellular advanced Wi-Fi , enhanced GPS, Bluetooth , among others.
item7: OVERVIEW We, together consolidated subsidiaries, leading developer, manufacturer provider analog mixed-signal semiconductor products solutions numerous applications, including aerospace, automotive, broadband, cellular infrastructure, connected home, defense, entertainment gaming, industrial, medical, smartphone, tablet, wearables.
